ygData.subject: Re: GUILD
ygData.msgSnippet: If we get 10 people who are interested we can vote on a NAME for the guild.   I was just throwing a name out there. thanks! ... From: Mata To:
ygData.messageBody:
If we get 10 people who are interested we can vote on a NAME for the guild. I was just throwing a name out there.

thanks!

----- Original Message -----
From: Mata
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, June 08, 1999 2:50 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] GUILD


I want to propose a ALL NECROMANCER / SHADOWKNIGHT guild on Eci

Called "DARK COUNSIL"

my character is named SKEL on Eci /tell me or email me at

studer@... if you play on Eci and would be interested in joining. We need 10 people to create a guild.

Tell any Shadowknight friends about it too!! Have them email me or give me a /tell


I need CHARACTER NAMES in the emails. Thanks!

P.S. If anyone knows of an existing all Necro guild on Eci please let me know. Thanks! :-)
